title: Fix Google Login Security block (Issue #3)
description:
Two issues found:
1. Task fails immediately after browser opens to about:blank - root cause unknown because debug logging is broken
2. Debug mode toggle exists in Settings but debug logs are NEVER displayed in the UI - the onDebugLog preload API is exposed but no component subscribes to it

The stealth evasions (bf15d6d) work correctly when tested directly. The issue is in task execution flow, but we can't diagnose without working debug logging.
